code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{db}from'./firebaseConfig';import{collection,query,where,getDocs,setDoc,doc}from"firebase/firestore";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectNameInput=_ref=>{let{onProjectCreated}=_ref;const[projectName,setProjectName]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');const projectsRef=collection(db,"projects");const q=query(projectsRef,where("name","==",projectName));const querySnapshot=await getDocs(q);if(!querySnapshot.empty){setError('同じ名前の物があります。異なる名前を使用してください');}else{await setDoc(doc(db,"projects",projectName),{name:projectName});onProjectCreated(projectName);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Input your project name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:projectName,onChange:e=>setProjectName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Make"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error})]});};export default ProjectNameInput;
